statements: SELECT * FROM AudienceSegmentation ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT demographic, interests FROM AudienceSegmentation WHERE buying_behavior = 'High';
SELECT id, interests, buying_behavior FROM AudienceSegmentation WHERE demographic = 'Male' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM AudienceSegmentation WHERE buying_behavior = 'Low' AND interests LIKE '%sports%';
SELECT demographic, interests, buying_behavior FROM AudienceSegmentation WHERE demographic = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM AudienceSegmentation WHERE id = 1;
SELECT demographic, interests FROM AudienceSegmentation WHERE buying_behavior IN ('impulsive', 'loyal');
SELECT * FROM AudienceSegmentation WHERE interests LIKE '%technology%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM AudienceSegmentation WHERE buying_behavior = 'impulsive' AND demographic = 'young adult' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, interests FROM AudienceSegmentation WHERE buying_behavior = 'loyal' OR buying_behavior = 'careful';
SELECT * FROM affiliates;
SELECT affiliate_name, affiliate_email FROM affiliates WHERE affiliate_location = 'New York';
SELECT affiliate_id, affiliate_name FROM affiliates WHERE affiliate_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM audience_segmentation WHERE segment_id = 3;
SELECT segment_name FROM audience_segmentation ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM affiliates WHERE affiliate_name = 'Example Affiliate' AND affiliate_location = 'New York';
SELECT affiliate_name, affiliate_email FROM affiliates WHERE affiliate_location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY affiliate_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_affiliates FROM affiliates WHERE affiliate_location IN ('Chicago', 'Miami');
SELECT segment_name, demographics ->> 'age' AS age_group FROM audience_segmentation WHERE segment_name LIKE 'F%';
SELECT segment_name, interests -> 'hobbies' AS hobbies_list FROM audience_segmentation WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(interests, JSON_ARRAY('reading', 'sports'));
SELECT * FROM audience_demographics;
SELECT age, gender, location FROM audience_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT audience_id, interest_category, interest_level FROM audience_interests WHERE audience_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM audience_behavior WHERE last_purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT audience_id, age, gender, location FROM audience_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM audience_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT audience_id, location FROM audience_demographics WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT audience_id, interest_category, interest_level FROM audience_interests WHERE interest_level > 3;
SELECT audience_id, purchase_history, last_purchase_date FROM audience_behavior WHERE last_purchase_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT a.audience_id, a.location, b.interest_category, c.purchase_history FROM audience_demographics a JOIN audience_interests b ON a.audience_id = b.audience_id JOIN audience_behavior c ON a.audience_id = c.audience_id;
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM demographics
SELECT * FROM interests WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC
SELECT user_id, purchase_history->'total_purchases' AS total_purchases FROM buying_behavior
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT user_id, age, location FROM demographics WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM interests WHERE interest_name = 'Travel'
SELECT demographics.user_id, demographics.age, interests.interest_name FROM demographics JOIN interests ON demographics.user_id = interests.user_id
SELECT * FROM buying_behavior WHERE JSON_LENGTH(purchase_history) > 3
SELECT * FROM demographics
SELECT age, gender FROM demographics
SELECT location FROM demographics WHERE age > 25
SELECT * FROM interests WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, purchase_count FROM buying_behavior ORDER BY purchase_count DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM demographics;
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT d.user_id, d.age, i.interest FROM demographics d JOIN interests i ON d.user_id = i.user_id;
SELECT c.campaign_id, c.campaign_name, ct.target_date, ct.campaign_score FROM campaigns c JOIN campaign_targeting ct ON c.campaign_id = ct.campaign_id;
SELECT d.user_id, d.location, bb.purchase_count, bb.total_amount FROM demographics d JOIN buying_behavior bb ON d.user_id = bb.user_id WHERE bb.purchase_count > 5;
